results.title: Simvastatin Blocks Reinstatement of Cocaine-induced Conditioned Place Preference in Male Mice with Brain Lipidome Remodeling.
results.text_hl: We found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ blocked the reinstatement of @CHEMICAL_Cocaine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003042 @@@cocaine@@@-induced conditioned place preference (@<m>DISEASE_Occupational_Stress</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000073397 @@@CPP@@@) without affecting @<m>DISEASE_Occupational_Stress</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000073397 @@@CPP@@@ acquisition.

citations.NLM: Xu W, He Y, Zhang J, Li H, Wan X, Li M, Wang Y, Xu R, Zhang H, Dai Y, Liu H, Jiang L, Zhao Y, Cen X. Simvastatin Blocks Reinstatement of Cocaine-induced Conditioned Place Preference in Male Mice with Brain Lipidome Remodeling. Neurosci Bull. 2021 Dec;37(12):1683-1702. PMID: 34491535
